meanings.sent1: Postmillenarians gather every Sunday to discuss their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of postmillenarians at the church conference.
meanings.sent3: The postmillenarians organized a potluck to celebrate their faith.
meanings.sent4: In the town of postmillenarians, hope and optimism filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The postmillenarians' dedication to their cause was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Those who adhere to the belief that Christ will return after the millennium.
meanings.sent1: The postmillenarians eagerly await Christ's return after the millennium.
meanings.sent2: Many postmillenarians study the scriptures to understand this belief.
meanings.sent3: At the postmillenarians' gathering, they debated the timing of Christ's return.
meanings.sent4: The postmillenarians' faith in Christ's eventual return was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: Postmillenarians find comfort in the promise of Christ's return after the millennium.

meanings.definition: Followers of the doctrine that the world will gradually improve before Christ's second coming.
meanings.sent1: Postmillenarians work tirelessly to make the world a better place.
meanings.sent2: The postmillenarians believe in the gradual improvement of society.
meanings.sent3: The postmillenarians' optimism about the future is contagious.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of postmillenarians, every small act of kindness contributes to a better world.
meanings.sent5: The postmillenarians' hope for a brighter future is their driving force.
